document.full_text: it is hard to imagine being under appreciated when you have been a 10-time all-star, an nba most valuable player and the best european ever in the world's greatest basketball league, but dirk nowitzki might just be.
document.title: nowitzki may be under appreciated for lack of an nba title
lines_and_colors: it is hard to imagine being under appreciated when you have been a 10-time all-star, an nba most valuable player and the best european ever in the world's greatest basketball league, but dirk nowitzki might just be.
